name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Steven A. SCHANDELMEIER, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Steven A. SCHANDELMEIER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert W. Lape, Jr., Roaring Spring, for appellant.
William J. Haberstroh, Dist. Atty., Darlee Sill, Keith A. Pesto, Asst. Dist. Attys., Hollidaysburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
548 A.2d 545
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Steven A. SCHANDELMEIER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 30, 1988.
Decided Oct. 20, 1988.
Robert W. Lape, Jr., Roaring Spring, for appellant.
William J. Haberstroh, Dist. Atty., Darlee Sill, Keith A. Pesto, Asst. Dist. Attys., Hollidaysburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
